title: Commode
description: Commode; Attributed to Joseph Baumhauer (French, died 1772); Paris, France; about 1750; Oak veneered with ebony; set with panels of Japanese lacquer on Japanese arborvitae, painted with vernis Martin; gilt-bronze mounts; campan mélangé vert marble top; 88.3 × 146.1 × 62.6 cm (34 3/4 × 57 1/2 × 24 5/8 in.); 55.DA.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
